mapper.select: SELECT t.noticenum, nickname, startdate, title, hits, boardtype, content, creatorid, image FROM t3_board t LEFT OUTER JOIN t3_board_img i on t.noticenum = i.noticenum WHERE t.noticenum = #{noticenum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t3_board (title, content, hits, startdate, creatorid, boardtype, nickname) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, '0', NOW() , #{userId}, #{boardtype}, #{nickname})
mapper.update: UPDATE t3_board SET hits = hits + 1 WHERE noticenum = #{noticenum}
